data.actual_result: The first message has the old profile picture/username and the second message has the updated profile picture/username. I also get this, when someone else is sending me messages via DM
data.expected_result: The first message should have the updated profile picture/username
data.short_description: Changing profile picture/username doesn't display the updated picture/usernsme after sending messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Change your profile picture or username - send an internet link
